name: Namco Classic
overview: Namco Classic is a golf game developed by Namco and published for the Game Boy in 1991. The game features Round Play, which you can use to practice the course in the game or compete with friends, or Tournament mode, where you play against a computer opponent in an effort to win a large amount of prize money. The Game Boy version features a different course than the 1988 Famicom version, but is very similar in many respects. In 1996, this version was also included in the compilation title, Namco Gallery Vol. 1.
